WELCOME TO THE HOUSE OF HORRORS欢迎来到惊骇屋Dare you enter this terrifying Halloween Mansion build？你是否有胆量踏入这间诡异的万圣建筑？
October may be a distant memory, but we’d be remiss if we didn’t spotlight at least one of the incredible creepy builds the Minecraft community came up with. One of my favs was this spooksome standalone structure built by Sinbad. The lovely image of Sinbad's build you see above, and those on the grey background below, were rendered by TheItalian828.十月终成一段久远的记忆，然而若无法让大家注意到至少一款MC社区的伟大工艺品，便是我们的失职。而我最喜欢的建筑之一，便是这由辛柏德（Sinbad）制作的骇人的独楼。本文上方你看到的可爱的楼房照片，和文章下方灰色的背景片，是由大意大利828（Theitalian828）渲染出的。


“Parts of it are hand built,” says Sinbad, “but I use every time saving method available to me and the server I play on is equipped with both World Edit and Voxel Sniper. Every piece of the build is hand-crafted - I just spend time doing another piece of the build instead of repeating myself.”“这个楼的一部分，是我动手做的。”辛柏德讲道，“然而我用大多数的时间去寻找和保留新的方法，我的服务器是带有世界编辑（World Edit）和Voxel Sniper的，这里的每一件工艺品都是我亲手制作的，然而只会花费时间去做完全崭新的建筑，从不重复制作相同的东西。

Sinbad doesn’t like to dive into his builds unplanned, but spends time getting a clear feel for the mood or story behind the piece, then uses reference material to construct a strong concept - “blueprints of pillars, windows, the whole nine yards, really,” he says. Sometimes he sketches things out in advance, and usually begins placing blocks with the centrepiece - but the Halloween Mansion was a little different:辛柏德并不喜欢在毫无准备的情况下深入探讨自己建筑物的意义，然而这次他却花费时间对建筑物获得明晰的感触，并尝试发掘自己建筑物后隐藏的故事，然后参考一些材料去构造一个强有力的概念。“我想了很久，真的，还为柱子，窗户，各处画了蓝图，整整九码。（1码=0.914米）。”他这样说。有时他会提前画草图，然后经常从核心动工放麦块~然而这间万圣屋却有所不同。
“By using reference images of houses I mapped out the front porch and, when I had that down, I used that as a reference point to get the rest of the building in the right scale. But there is never one sure method for doing things!通过观察建筑的参照图我在脑中构造出了门廊，当我将门廊做好之后，我就把门廊当作参考物，在适当范围内搭建出了整幢房屋。然而制作这件工艺品时，我却从来没有一个确定的方法。

When I'm in the zone is usually how I get my best work done,” says Sinbad. “When I listen to some music that gets me emotional or when I’m on top of life or even when I feel like I need to prove something - those are the things that pushes me further.“当我在状态时我经常能做出惊艳的作品“辛柏德说：”当我去听一些能感动我的音乐或者当我在人生难得的喜悦中甚至是我突然觉得有些地方需要补足时。这些时刻，这些情感，这些思想都会激励，敦促我继续向更远的目标行进
"The learning curve is different for everyone and I believe that with enough time anyone could learn to build. The key is to experiment and be creative.”每个人都有中意的学习方法，我相信在充足的时间下，每个人都能学会搭建华丽的建筑物。而这其中的秘诀，就是经验和创造力。
Inspiringly spooky stuff!多么令人惊讶的建筑师啊！多么悚人的建筑！
